definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: city of Hadarezer ([[מִטִּבְחַת]]) ´[[וּמִכּוּן עָרֵי ה]] 1Ch 18:8, LXX e)k tw=n e)klektw=n pole/(m)wn (= [[בֵּרׂתַי]] 2Sa 8:8); = mod. Kuna, near Bereitan (betw. Laodicea and Heliopolis), acc. to Furrer:ZPV viii, 34, v. [[בֵּרוֹתָה]] p. 92 supr., and Thes.
